title: Heretic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player, Blessing them (if they are Unseen) and all their Unseen visitors tonight. If a Blessed player would die, instead you delay their death for 2 nights. Their delayed death cannot be prevented for any reason.
- At night, Falsely Bless a player, making them believe you Blessed them and they were attacked. They may not use abilities until 2 nights pass. They will not die at the end of the fake delayed-death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players undergoing their delayed death may not use abilities at night.
- The attacker of a Blessed player will be told their defense was too strong to kill.
- Players will not be notified they were Blessed unless their death is delayed.
- Retain your Background that you received.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
